Stock Market.title: Stock Market Highlights 26 December 2025: Markets slide for third straight session as foreign fund outflows drag Sensex 367 points, Nifty slips 99.80 points to 26,042.30
Stock Market.summary:
Sensex, Nifty Live Updates on 26 December 2025: Falling for the third consecutive day, Sensex dropped 367.25 points or 0.43 per cent to settle at 85,041.45 in a thin trade. During the day, it tanked 470.88 points or 0.55 per cent to 84,937.82.
 Nifty declined…
